resources.string:
"为什么需要开启无障碍权限？
1.开启无障碍权限，找券助手就可以自动识别淘宝的商品，直接查找出该商品隐藏的优惠券，领券下单就可以省钱了～
2.无障碍权限开启后，即使不打开小米省钱购app，进入淘宝app内，找券助手也可以随时帮您找到合适的优惠券～"
"Your Mi Account hasn't been activated. Activate it and try again."

"Welcome to the GetApps. You can use this app to implement browsing, recommendation, download, install, and update functions. We will strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations and privacy policies to protect your personal information. To provide basic services, you need to be connected to the Internet and call your permissions or features to collect the necessary personal information:
